org.primer.llm.rules: Use as minimum size for interactive elements on desktop/mouse interfaces. Smaller than touch targets for denser layouts. Do NOT use for touch/mobile contexts.

original.$description: Minimum target size for fine pointer devices (mouse)

control-minTarget-auto.name: control-minTarget-auto
control-minTarget-auto.description: Minimum target size for fine pointer devices (mouse)

org.primer.llm.rules: Use for spacing between interactive controls on desktop in standard layouts. Do NOT use for mobile/touch interfaces.

original.$description: Gap between stacked controls in medium density layouts for mouse interfaces

org.primer.llm.rules: Use for spacing between interactive controls on desktop in standard layouts. Do NOT use for mobile/touch interfaces.

controlStack-medium-gap-auto.name: controlStack-medium-gap-auto
controlStack-medium-gap-auto.description: Gap between stacked controls in medium density layouts for mouse interfaces

org.primer.llm.rules: Use for spacing between interactive controls on desktop in compact layouts. Tighter spacing than touch devices. Do NOT use for mobile/touch interfaces.

original.$description: Gap between stacked controls in small density layouts for mouse interfaces
